title: The Devil in Disguise
description: In this Dateline classic, an ex-Navy man marries the love of his life. Five months later, his new bride finds him dead on their bedroom floor leaving family and authorities puzzled. Who would want him dead? Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 12, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
